-- | An adapter to convert attoparsec Parsers into blazing-fast Iteratees
--   
--   An adapter to convert attoparsec Parsers into blazing-fast Iteratees
@package attoparsec-iteratee
@version 0.4.0


-- | A function to convert attoparsec <a>Parser</a>s into <a>Iteratee</a>s.
module Data.Attoparsec.Iteratee
data ParseError
ParseError :: [String] -> String -> ParseError
errorContexts :: ParseError -> [String]
errorMessage :: ParseError -> String

-- | A function to convert attoparsec <a>Parser</a>s into <a>Iteratee</a>s.
parserToIteratee :: Monad m => Parser a -> Iteratee ByteString m a
instance Typeable ParseError
instance Show ParseError
instance Exception ParseError
